data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Software quality is very important, especially for commercial and system software like Microsoft Office, Microsoft Windows and Linux. If ____ is ____ ( ____ ), it ____ delete a person's ____, ____ the ____ and ____ other ____ things. Faults ____ errors ____ called `` bugs '' which ____ often ____ during ____ and ____ testing. Software is often also a victim to what is known as software aging, the progressive performance degradation resulting from a combination of unseen bugs.
data.partBlankContent: Software quality is very important, especially for commercial and system software like Microsoft Office, Microsoft Windows and Linux. If soft____ is fau___ ( bu___ ), it c__ delete a person's wo__, cr___ the comp____ and d_ other unexp_____ things. Faults a__ errors a__ called `` bugs '' which a__ often disco_____ during al___ and be__ testing. Software is often also a victim to what is known as software aging, the progressive performance degradation resulting from a combination of unseen bugs.
data.answer: 软件质量是非常重要的，特别是对于商业软件和系统软件，如Microsoft Office, Microsoft Windows和Linux。如果软件有故障(bug)，它可以删除一个人的工作，使计算机崩溃，并做其他意想不到的事情。错误和错误被称为“bug”，通常在alpha和beta测试期间发现。软件也经常是所谓的软件老化的受害者，软件老化是由一些看不见的bug组合而成的性能逐渐下降。
